```{r}
library(datavolley)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      error = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE)
```

PIPPO2
================================================================================

```{r risultato}


mtcars %>%
  head() %>%
  dplyr::select(cyl, mpg) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    mpg_pct_max = round(mpg / max(mpg) * 100, digits = 2),
    mpg_scaled = mpg / max(mpg) * 100
  ) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(mpg_unscaled = mpg) %>%
  gt(id = "one") %>%
  gt_plt_bar_pct(column = mpg_scaled, scaled = TRUE) %>%
  gt_plt_bar_pct(column = mpg_unscaled, scaled = FALSE, fill = "blue", background = "lightblue") %>%
  cols_align("right", contains("scale")) %>%
  cols_width(
    4 ~ px(5),
    5 ~ px(5)
  ) %>% 
    opt_css(
    css = "
    #one .gt_col_heading {
      padding: 2px 3px;
      font-size: 50px;
    }
    #one .gt_row {
      padding: 2px 3px;
      font-size: 5px;
    }
    #one .gt_col_heading {
      text-align: center !important;
    }
    "
  )

```
